title: The Grey Woman
description: The Grey WomanElizabeth Cleghorn GASKELL (1810 - 1865)A "Bluebeard" story in which a young woman marries a man whom she discovers has killed his previous wives and is trying to kill her as well. (Summary by Jane Greensmith)Genre(s): General Fiction, Horror & Supernatural Fiction, Detective FictionLanguage: English
author: Elizabeth Gaskell
